summary.span: 提供支持在单个容器中存储多个数据对象的类。

span.span: Provides classes that support storage of multiple data objects in a single container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，可用于将对象组织到可移植性和高效访问定义的物理格式的单个实体。 is an abstract class that can be used to organize objects into a single entity of a defined physical format for portability and efficient access. ZIP 文件是物理的主要格式。A ZIP file is the primary physical format for the . 其他实现可能使用其他物理格式，如 XML 文档时，数据库，或 Web 服务。Other implementations might use other physical formats such as an XML document, a database, or Web service. 与文件系统，类似的项包含在中分层组织文件夹和文件的引用。Like a file system, items contained in a are referenced in a hierarchical organization of folders and files. 尽管是一个抽象类派生的类用作默认情况下方法。Although is an abstract class, the derived class is used as default by the method. 一个（"部件"） 是表示存储在一个对象的抽象类。A ("part") is the abstract class that represents an object that is stored in a . 一个（"关系"） 定义一个源之间的关联或和目标对象。A ("relationship") defines an association between a source or and a target object. 一个可以是两种类型，其中每个可以是以下两种形式之一：A can be one of two types, each of which can be one of two forms: - 包级别关系 (通过创建)Package-level relationship (created by ) - 之间和目标部件在包中的。Between a and a target part in the package. - 之间和包外部的目标资源。Between a and a target resource outside the package. - 部件级关系 (通过创建)Part-level relationship (created by ) - 源之间和包中的另一个目标部件。Between a source and another target part in the package. - 源之间和包外部的目标资源。Between a source and a target resource outside the package. 关系的源或源被视为此关系的"所有者"。The relationship's source or source is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源对象时，也删除源对象拥有的所有关系。When the source object is deleted, all the relationships owned by the source object are also deleted. 创建或删除的关系的过程不会以物理方式更改以任何方式的源或目标对象。The process of creating or deleting a relationship does not physically change either the source or target objects in any way. 一个（"数字签名"） 是组合的部件和关系表示数字签名中包含。A ("digital signature") is a composition of parts and relationships representing a digital signature included with a . 数字签名标识，发起方，并验证已签名的部件和关系包含在尚未修改。The digital signature identifies the originator and validates that the signed parts and relationships contained in the have not been modified. 包还支持数字版权管理 (DRM)，这样中的内容元素进行加密的经过授权的用户授予特定访问权限。Packages also support Digital Rights Management (DRM), which allows content elements in a to be encrypted with specific access rights granted to authorized users. 基于体系结构中，是一种包类型设计用来存储文档基于开放式[XML 纸张规范 (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。Based on the architecture, an is a package type designed for storing documents based on the open [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). Windows Presentation Foundation 使用包来存储内容、 资源和页面和文档，默认情况下使用标准 ZIP 文件的关系。Windows Presentation Foundation uses packages to store content, resources, and relationships for pages and documents using a standard ZIP file by default. 你的应用程序可以使用任何 ZIP 文件，如类来存储，并根据需要保护任何类型或单个有效地访问容器中的数据文件数。As with any ZIP file, your application can use the classes to store and optionally protect any type or number of data files in a single efficient-to-access container. 有关详细信息，请参阅开放打包约定 (OPC) 规范，可供下载的 XPS 节[Windows 硬件开发人员中心](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification, available for download at the XPS section of [Windows Hardware Developer Central](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
